snippet.title: They Are Billions - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Survival Beta and Special Editions available now!
http://www.numantiangames.com/support-they-are-billions/

On Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/644930
Visit us: http://www.numantiangames.com

They Are Billions - A Steam-punk Apocalypse by Numantian Games

Imagine a world devastated by billions of infected humans after a zombie-like apocalypse. Build human colonies to survive in a post-apocalyptic planet where billions of the infected try to annihilate the few remaining living humans.

The colonies must defend themselves against swarms of the infected that roam the world using retro technology because all knowledge has rewound back to that of similar to the XIX century.

Coming soon for Fall 2017 for PC!
